descr.message: This extension allows you to add signs in the GPF fast and easy.

thanksText.message:
- Thanks to avm99963 for his support.

- Thanks to all the Chrome-Es group for test the app and use it.

error_no_gpf_tab.message: Oops! Yo can't insert a sign in the actual tab! Please, go to a GPF tab!

errorNamelenght.message: Oops! You missed insert a name, or your name its too long (This must be between 3 and 30 characters)
